title: Get two Dollar Flight Club plans for less than $60
description:
What do you get the world traveler in your life? You help them travel more! With a flight alert service like Dollar Flight Club, they’ll be able to find the best flight deals possible to destinations all over the world. Through Christmas Day, we’re offering exclusive discounts on two-packs of Premium and Premium+ Plans.

While you’d usually have to pay a monthly fee, with these deals, you can pay once and have lifetime access to all Dollar Flight Club has to offer. That includes daily price aler
